metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16743 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in mgetty before 1.2.1. Incontrib/next-login/login.c, the command-line parameter username is passedunsanitized to strcpy(), which can cause a stack-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: mgetty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
